label: Achilles
description: hero of the Iliad, greatest warrior of the Greeks at Troy

label: Agamemnon
description: leader of the Greek forces at Troy

label: Leto
description: Titan, mother of Apollo and Artemis

label: Menelaus
description: king of Sparta, brother of Agamemnon

label: Priam
description: king of Troy, father of Hector and Paris
